io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.seed

Class RandomSeederThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.util.LooperThread
        • io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.seed.RandomSeederThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public final class RandomSeederThread
extends LooperThread
    Thread that loops over Random instances and reseeds them. No EntropyCountingRandom will be reseeded when it's already had more input than output.
    Author:
    Chris Hennick

    • Method Detail

      • hasInstance

        public static boolean hasInstance(SeedGenerator seedGenerator)
        Returns whether a RandomSeederThread using the given SeedGenerator is running or not.
        Parameters:
        seedGenerator - a SeedGenerator to find an instance for.
        Returns:
        true if a RandomSeederThread using the given SeedGenerator is running; false otherwise.

      • stopAllEmpty

        public static void stopAllEmpty()
        Shut down all instances with which no Random instances are registered.

      • wakeUp

        public static boolean wakeUp(SeedGenerator seedGenerator)
        Notifies the thread for the given SeedGenerator that PRNGs are waiting to be reseeded. This method does not block, because if it cannot immediately take the lock to signal the condition, then that means the thread is already running or being woken up.

        Warning: This may return true during a brief window while the thread is shutting down.

        Parameters:
        seedGenerator - the SeedGenerator that should reseed random
        Returns:
        Whether or not the thread exists and is now awake.

      • isEmpty

        public static boolean isEmpty(SeedGenerator seedGenerator)

      • add

        public static void add(SeedGenerator seedGenerator,
                       Random... randoms)
        Add one or more Random instances to the thread for the given SeedGenerator.
        Parameters:
        seedGenerator - The SeedGenerator that will reseed the randoms
        randoms - One or more Random instances to be reseeded

      • remove

        public static void remove(SeedGenerator seedGenerator,
                          Random... randoms)
        Remove one or more Random instances from the thread for the given SeedGenerator if such a thread exists and contains them.
        Parameters:
        seedGenerator - The SeedGenerator that will reseed the randoms
        randoms - One or more Random instances to be reseeded

      • iterate

        protected boolean iterate()
        Description copied from class: LooperThread
        The task that will be iterated until it returns false. Cannot be abstract for serialization reasons, but must be overridden in subclasses if they are instantiated without a target Runnable.
        Overrides:
        iterate in class LooperThread
        Returns:
        true if this thread should iterate again.
